name: Scareclaw Belone
effectText: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your Main Monster Zone, adjacent to a "Scareclaw" monster you control or in its column. You can only Special Summon "Scareclaw Belone" once per turn this way. If your "Scareclaw" monster in the Extra Monster Zone attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
